quiz.question: When was the Battle of Waterloo, ending Napoleon's rule?
When was the Gutenberg Bible completed, marking a milestone in printing history?
Which year did the Reform Act of 1867 in Britain significantly extend voting rights to urban working men?
What year did Australia become a federated nation (Commonwealth of Australia)?
Which year was the Magna Carta reissued with broader royal concessions after initial sealing?
When did the Tet Offensive occur, a pivotal series of conflicts in the Vietnam War?
When did India gain independence from British rule?
What year did the first Crusade capture Jerusalem, establishing several Crusader states?
When did the Haitian Revolution begin, leading to the world's first Black republic?
What year did the Titanic sink on its maiden voyage?
When did the Ottoman Empire officially dissolve after World War I?
What year did the Periclean building program, including the Parthenon, begin in Athens?
Which year did the Great Fire of London occur?
In which year did the British Parliament pass the Reform Act extending the franchise in 19th century Britain?
When did Tokugawa Ieyasu consolidate power at the Battle of Sekigahara, initiating Tokugawa shogunate rule?
